issue.title: [C++] Change variant implementation
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5252](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5252). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Our vendored variant implementation, [Mapbox variant](https://github.com/mapbox/variant), does not provide the same API as the official [C++17 variant class](https://en.cppreference.com/w/cpp/utility/variant).

We could / should switch to an implementation that follows the C++17 API, such as https://github.com/mpark/variant or https://github.com/martinmoene/variant-lite .
